name: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会宿舍旧址
name_en: Hostel of the First National Congress of the CPC
description: 中共一大的代表们曾在此住宿和讨论工作，与又新印刷所、新青年社形成了“理论-住宿-发行”的早期革命活动闭环。
description_en: Delegates to the First National Congress of the CPC stayed and discussed their work here, forming a closed loop of early revolutionary activities: "Theory (New Youth Office) - Accommodation (here) - Publication (Youxin Press)".
